name: NWO Chamber
description:
Entry for the Legacy Mob Beginner Jam 22.

This chamber... Words and secrets... And maybe a Way Out.

Will you be able to escape the chamber? Travel through this experimental game and question yourself if you can trust that which you can not see or hear. And maybe, try to escape.

Can you Find your Way Out?

Toggle Fullscreen if playing in-browser!!

Controls

WASD / LEFT STICK - Move

MOUSE / RIGHT STICK - Look

E / WEST BUTTON (X/Square) - Interact

R / BACK - Restart Level

CREDITS

A game by Enrique "Nebuchaddy" Lopez & Siddhant 'csid10' Rathor for the 5-Days LM0B Game Jam #22

Sound & Music - CC0 Licensed - https://freesound.org

ShonJhepard & xMedianoche - Testing and Feedback
